entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers or drizzle. Low plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. 30 percent chance of drizzle overnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of drizzle. High 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of drizzle early in the morning. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 15. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy after midnight. A few showers near Gold River overnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 24 April 2023
